agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations TIME & DATE: 7:30 AM, Tuesday, February 5, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. John Zerwas The House Appropriations Committee will meet to hear testimony on the following: · Correctional Managed Health Care · Border Security · Driver License Program · Trusteed Programs Within the Office of the Governor including the Governor's School Safety Plan · Texas Child Support Enforcement System 2.0 (T2) Project The committee will hear invited testimony only. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
